text: Kulaŋ 13.12 Mt 10.21 mu nudɨ isaimahalinu agɨladɨ ifɨhɨmuhɨmu saŋ huban agɨladɨ micɨ vica ubali uamalɨ. Iagagalinɨlu agɨlaŋ ninanadinɨlu agɨladɨ haman laci ala lɨbalɨhavi uamalɨ. Ninanadinɨlu agɨlaŋ aveji iamiagagalinɨlu agɨladɨ nagɨli lamadamaŋ kulaŋ limu hɨhɨle agɨladɨ abavɨdaci nulɨdɨ ifɨhɨmɨbalɨhavi uamalɨ.
